content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, I'm glad you like the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering how much I value living in a modern, central location, I want to propose starting the negotiation with a price reduction of around 50 Euros from your initial offer. If we reach an agreement at this adjusted amount, I'll be delighted to take this apartment.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I don't appreciate your attempt to haggle. My time is valuable and I'm not here to play games.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
